description.en: Make Sky Q part of your Homey automation all in one place, easy

hint.en: Send remote commands. The parameters for C2 to C10 are optional. Example, to select a specific channel use Backup, Backup, 1, 0, 4.
Specifies the IP address of the SKy Q box on your network.
Specifies the MAC address of the SKy Q box on your network.
